bibliokit-blocks.title: BiblioKit Blocks ‚Äì Design System Analytics
bibliokit-blocks.description: BiblioKit Blocks is a professional analytics platform for Figma design systems. Track component usage, measure ROI, and make smarter decisions to optimize design libraries with AI-powered insights.

details.title: Automated Figma Integration
details.description: Secure OAuth integration tracks Figma component usage across libraries and files in real-time.

details.title: Visual Analytics Dashboard
details.description: View adoption trends, usage patterns, and performance metrics with export-ready insights.

details.title: Component Insights
details.description: Detect overused, underused, and unused components with actionable recommendations.

details.title: ROI Reporting
details.description: Show stakeholders quantifiable efficiency gains and cost savings from design system adoption.

details.title: Collaboration Metrics
details.description: Enable multi-user dashboards with role-based access and team-wide visibility.

benefits: Boost design system adoption by 25%+ with real usage data
Cut component maintenance by 30% with actionable insights
Prove ROI with measurable productivity gains and savings
Accelerate product delivery by 20‚Äì40% through streamlined workflows
Achieve 85%+ component reuse across design projects
Support evidence-based component deprecation and optimization

specifications.name: Figma OAuth Integration
specifications.value: Secure API connection with read-only access to design files and component libraries

specifications.name: Real-time Analytics
specifications.value: Live tracking of component usage, adoption rates, and team collaboration metrics

specifications.name: Data Export
specifications.value: CSV, PDF, and API export options for custom reporting and stakeholder presentations

pricing.description: Advanced design system analytics for growing teams. Includes a 14-day free trial.

llm.answerBox: BiblioKit Blocks provides comprehensive design system analytics that automatically tracks Figma component usage, measures ROI, and delivers actionable insights to optimize component libraries. Increase adoption rates by 25%+ and reduce maintenance overhead through data-driven decision making for product teams.
